item.title: Using Entra ID Authentication with Arc-Enabled SQL Server in a .NET Windows Forms Application
item.description:
SAMPLE CODE: GitHub Repository Prerequisites
Arc-enabled SQL Server 2022/2025 configured for Entra ID authentication Entra ID (Azure AD) tenant and app registration .NET Framework 4.6.2 Windows Forms application (Not required .NET version, only what the solution is based on) Microsoft.Identity.Client, Microsoft.Data.SqlClient NuGet packages
Application Overview
User authenticates with Entra ID Token is acquired and used to connect to SQL Server Option to persist token cache or keep it in memory Data is retrieved and displayed in a DataGridView Similar setup to use SSMS with Entra ID in a...
